data.title: Elena Radeva on LinkedIn: Are you fast learner?
data.text:
To challenge yourself, to fight with your nature instincts, to work in a team, to be a partner, to throw yourself in the mud, to conquer the obstacles. A powerful team with strong energy, motivation, uncoprimise team spirit, and beliefs. We Are the HPE team at Legion Run 2024, Bulgaria üí™üòäüß° And moreover this was an event with a cause supporting Fondation The First Three Minutes. Kudos to all conquerors and to the HPE Wellness Team organizers üåûüëèüòä What an adventure, incredible vibe, and motivationüèÖ #WeAreHPE #HPE #wellness #culture #team, #CSR #legionrun2024 Hewlett Packard Enterprise

The 10th anniversary edition of the Leadership Academy of Council of Women in Business in Bulgaria has ended. I am proud to say that I successfully completed it and got certified. I met and got to know extraordinary women, smart and very talented ladies. Every single lecture was led by great professionals and business leaders, which made them even more valuable and meaningful. Thanks to Council of Women in Business in Bulgaria for the opportunity to be a part of this amazing adventure. Thanks to UniCredit Bulbank for the hospitality. And that's just the beginning. I look forward to our new meetings. #leadership #leaders #CWBB #womeninbusiness

A great program to support the young people and their development. Mentor the Young is giving them opportunities to grow in their profession and personal lifes, just they need stay active and curious. Mentors are those who support and give directions for the next steps ahead and supporting them to gain a successful motions in their goals. Our mentor-mentee duet - me as mentor and Daniel Ivanov as mentee, established great success. I believe that we built strong relationships, covered the set aims and positioned future areas of growth. I'm proud of the gained results and believe that they will continue. Thank you to Hewlett Packard Enterprise for the support and granted opportunity. #HPE #mentorship #culture #opportunities #future

The upbringing of the children should become since their born. And very often when we are trying to explaine them the world around us become more than hard when the topic is sensitive and touch their mental health. And yes, the books can help, as a bridge between the world and any theme on the table. She is building and maintaining this bridge with her books. She is Radostina Nikolova, mother's of "mots", writer and founder of Marmote publishing house. She was our guest in HPE Book Club, with her inspiring stories and wonderful books. #HPE #people #wellness #culture David Zlatev Borislava Kamenova #HPEBookClub
